title: building doc/progs fails: ./run: line 75: /tmp/gotest3: Permission denied
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

when building Go as multiple users at the same time on one machine, the build fails

What is the expected output?

build should work

What do you see instead?

--- cd ../doc/progs
./run: line 75: /tmp/gotest3: Permission denied
helloworld failed: "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz" is not "Hello, world; or
Καλημέρα κόσμε; or こんにちは 世界"

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

tip

Please provide any additional information below.

/tmp/gotest3 belongs to another user that did a go build at some point
